components.description: The CSV Read component can read a CSV file from the file system or from the message payload data. There are several supported CSV formats such as Excel, MongoDB and MySQL. The component allows to configure the data delimiter and whether to consider the first record as header or not. The output is a list of DataRow objects.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Sets the CSV format of the file to be read.

properties.name: file
properties.description: File to read the CSV data from

properties.name: delimiter
properties.description: The delimiter used in the input data to separate the data on each row.

properties.name: trim
properties.description: If true leading and trailing blanks are trimmed for each item in the data.

properties.name: firstRecordAsHeader
properties.description: Set this value to true if the CSV data contains data headers in the first line. Data header names can be used to retrieve data from the output data structure.

components.description: The CSV Write component can write CSV data to the file system or into the message payload data. There are several supported CSV formats such as Excel, MongoDB and MySQL. The component allows to configure the data delimiter and whether to add CSV headers at the beginning of the output file or not.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Sets the CSV format of the file to be written.

properties.name: file
properties.description: File to write the CSV data to

properties.name: delimiter
properties.description: The delimiter used in the input data to separate the data on each row.

properties.name: includeHeaders
properties.description: If true the headers specified in the 'Headers' property are included in the first CSV row.
